titles.title: Campaign Broadcast Discount Act of 1988
A bill to reduce campaign expenditures in elections by providing a stable, significant discount to candidates for broadcast advertising time prior to an election.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

bill.summary: 7/11/1988--Introduced. Campaign Broadcast Discount Act of 1988 - Amends the Communications Act of 1934 to revise broadcast media rates for candidates for public office to provide a discount for nonpreemptible or fixed time.
